resources.string: Developed by: ITMR Lab, IIIT Allahabad

Welcome to Interactive antiques

 Wait 6 seconds while you syncing with server

 1. Click on Scan button to detect QR code.

 2.Wait for 20 seconds it will load your model

 3.Select animation,information and other options from below buttons.

 4.wait 20 seconds for animation and three second for information.
Click Play to start the video...
